REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2174 reute h f BC-ITS-DEVELOPS-INTERACT 04-13 0057

TEXT.TITLE: ITS DEVELOPS INTERACTIVE VIDEO SYSTEMS
TEXT.BODY: <ITS Inc> said it has completed development of two interactive video systems for <Mass Mutual Insurance Co> under a two mln dlr development agreement. ITS said the systems are integrated, interactive marketing and training programs designed for the insurance industry. Reuter
